}}'''''Amon Hen'' 290''' is the two-hundred-and-ninetieth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in August [[2021]].
==Contents==
*Front cover: Varda by navyinks
*'''2''' - From the Editor’s Desk
*'''5''' - Behind Glass Doors
*'''7''' - Tolkien and Diversity by Troels Forchhammer
*'''9''' - Tolkien Treasury #3 by Chad High
*'''12''' - “Something Mighty Queer” by Danna Petersen-Deeprose
*'''17''' - Finding the feminine in Tolkien by Kathrin Heierl
*Centerfold: Dwarf Women by Kathrin Heierli
*'''21''' - Gurgling, Groaning, Grumbling Barrels by Sultana Raza
*'''22''' - “Middle-earth in the New World” by Martha Celis-Mendoza et al.
*'''28''' - “The Real J.R.R. Tolkien: The Man Who Created Middle-earth”
Book Review by Michael Cunningham
*'''30''' - Dating Tolkien #1 by Mick Henry
*'''31''' - Mathom
*'''32''' - News From Fangorn
*'''34''' - All Brân
*Back Cover by Morgan Rogers for Tolkien Diversity Week
